data.title: Amazon.com: C. William Davis III: books, biography, latest update
data.meta_description: Follow C. William Davis III and explore their bibliography from Amazon.com's C. William Davis III Author Page.
data.text:
Bill was born at Camp LeJeune, N.C. in 1944. He has lived in southwestern Pennsylvania most of his life. He graduated from Har-Brack High School in 1963 and from A.T.I. in Pittsburgh with a degree in Aerospace Electronics. He was employed by Westinghouse Aerospace in Baltimore, MD, working on Aerospace and space projects for the U.S. Government. He retired from ATI/Allegheny Ludlum Steel in the industrial/electrical field in 2002. He has been married for 45 years to his wife Linda and has two children and four grandchildren. Bill has had a lifetime interest in literature and writing and has published several pieces of poetry and the first three books in the Clive Aliston Mystery Series. He is also working on a book of short stories and possibly five more books in the series plus two other novels not connected to the series. His wife Linda is his business manager and as he says his toughest critic. They are presently putting together information on a novel that they may co-author together. Bill is a past member of Toastmasters International and past President of the Aspinwall Toastmasters. He has achieved status of Competent Communicator and leader and has attained the Competent Communicator Bronze Award. Bill is available for book clubs, book signings, speaking engagements and has worked with schools and colleges on workshops. Please check this web site for future book releases, signings and other engagements. He and his wife Linda are originators and coordinators of "A Gathering of Authors," a growing, talented and diverse group of authors of all genres. "A Gathering" is available for public appearances throughout the year.

Read full bio
